item.title: How to build HUGO website
item.description: Prerequisites You have Git 2.8 or greater installed on your machine. You have a GitHub account. The local network is smooth. Create a Hugo site Step 1: Install Hugo brew install hugo # or port install hugo To verify your new install: hugo version Step 2: Create a New Site hugo new site yourname The above will create a new Hugo site in a folder named ‘yourname’. Step 3: Add a Theme See themes.
